summary: SummaryNuFACE Prep-N-Glow Facial Towelettes gently cleanse and exfoliate skin for a healthy, radiant glow.
details: DetailsBenefitsGently exfoliate skin and polish away dead skin cells to reveal fresh, smooth skin using the microdot texture side. -Use before microcurrent treatment remove makeup and oil to prep skin for optimal resultsMade with high-quality actives to nourish skinCleansing and exfoliating dual-sided wipes are individually wrapped, making them ideal for travel and on-the-go use for a streamlined, mess-free skin routineFormula free of parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, alcohol, and added fragrancesKey IngredientsHyaluronic Acid: hydrates skin to visibly help improve the appearance of fine lines and wrinklesGrapeseed & Maqui Berry: superfruit antioxidants brighten and reveal skin's radianceSaccharomuces Copper, Manganese, Zinc Ferments: powerhouse fermented minerals help improve skin resiliencyItem 2642253How To UseCleanse with the smooth side to remove oil, makeup, dirt and impurities. Follow with the micro-dot side to gently exfoliate. Ideal for use before your microcurrent skincare routine.Use only as directed. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Discontinue use if irritation develops.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate/Succinate, Betaine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Saccharomyces/Copper Ferment, Saccharomyces/Manganese Ferment, Saccharomyces/Zinc Ferment, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Powder, Aristotelia Chilensis Fruit Juice, Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Citrate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Cleanse with the smooth side to remove oil, makeup, dirt and impurities. Follow with the micro-dot side to gently exfoliate. Ideal for use before your microcurrent skincare routine.Use only as directed. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Discontinue use if irritation develops.
